## ZoteroToolkit class

‚≠êContains all tools in this lib. Start from here if you are new to this lib.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ZoteroToolkit extends BasicTool 
```
**Extends:** [BasicTool](./zotero-plugin-toolkit.basictool.md)

## Remarks

To minimize your plugin, import the modules you need manually.
